name: Instant Pot® Frozen Salmon
author: Carol Castellucci Miller
summary: If you want to prepare salmon without thawing and have it stay warm and moist without overcooking, then this is your recipe!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Pour cold water and lemon juice into an electric pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Place a steamer rack inside; spray with cooking spray
Place frozen salmon fillets on the rack, skin-side down
Set cooker to the Steam 2 setting; cook for 3 to 4 minutes
Release vent immediately when pot beeps
Check salmon for desired doneness; fish should flake easily with a fork
Cover pot to keep salmon warm until serving
